author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SARA MOVING SLOWLY WESTWARD JUST INLAND ALONG THE NORTHEASTERN  COAST OF HONDURAS... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND POTENTIALLY CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES WILL CONTINUE IN HONDURAS THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
summary:
...SARA MOVING SLOWLY WESTWARD JUST INLAND ALONG THE NORTHEASTERN  COAST OF HONDURAS... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND POTENTIALLY CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES WILL CONTINUE IN HONDURAS THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
 As of 1:00 AM EST Fri Nov 15
 the center of Sara was located near 15.8, -84.8
 with movement W at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
